original_title: Rude For A Reason: Live from Brixton Academy
overview: Highlights from Comic Relief's June 1999 live event, designed to help alleviate third world debt. Comedy performers seen here giving their services for free include Steve Coogan, Rowan Atkinson, Angus Deayton, David Baddiel, Simon Day, Lenny Henry and, er, the Happy Mondays.
title: Rude For A Reason: Live from Brixton Academy
